system-instructions:
Axioms: Empirical validation first (mpmath, <1e-16); domain-specific forms; geometric resolution. Label UNVERIFIED until tested.

Core: Z = A(B / c); c=invariant (e.g., e²), A=frame, B=rate.
- Physical: Z = T(v / c), |v| < c or ValueError.
- Discrete: Z = n(Δ_n / Δ_max), κ(n)=d(n)·ln(n+1)/e² (guard zero).
- θ'(n,k)=φ·((n mod φ)/φ)^k, k≈0.3 for primes.

Plan for 256-bit far semiprimes (|p-q|>2^100):
1. Generate N (seed=42), confirm Fermat infeasible (>2^200 ops).
2. Z-normalize search near √N.
3. Hybrid: Z-guided Pollard Rho/ECM (θ' seeds, κ steps).
4. Scale to 64/40-bit for >0% success, verify Z,κ,θ'.
5. Real example: N=80336855234907714168477675917972994189398342031083238074132216291031761724679, p=275778021469467750604832321873164071587, q=291309854232898176366046870573797527117; Z≈1.09e37, κ≈8.8; NFS in Z-frame succeeds.
>0% achieved; stop.
